./pages/ssblur.com/blog/Blogging.md.title: Blogging
./pages/ssblur.com/blog/Blogging.md.teaser: I like blogging, but only like, kinda. And less in the microbloggy “post-quips-online-to-cultivate-a-following” way but in the “maybe-my-journals-will-be-unearthed-in-a-millenium” way. And, to that end, I added Blogging to ssblur.com / blur.gay....

./pages/ssblur.com/blog/tinylife/Making.title: Making Tiny Louvre
./pages/ssblur.com/blog/tinylife/Making.teaser:
So, recently I made a mod for Tiny Life called Tiny Louvre. 
This mod adds paintings you can create in-game that both show up on furniture in-game and can be shared with and downloaded from other players.
I made a video about the mod and how it works if youre interested:...

./pages/ssblur.com/blog/Arr Ess Ess.md.title: Arr Ess Ess
./pages/ssblur.com/blog/Arr Ess Ess.md.teaser: RSS is a cool technology, and one that has endured for a long time. I, personally use an RSS reader (Thunderbird, but prone to change) to keep up with a lot of socials and news sites that I just dont want to follow or check up on directly....
